attributes.description:
2014 Jeep Wrangler Runcorn 3.6 4x4 automatic for sale. Great 4x4 with a very unique look. Built for the adventurer at heart!
This car comes with full service history. This is a one owner car and well kept.
Don't miss this great buy. Very clean car. Comes with books and spare keys. 
Standard Features: Additional 12 Volt Socket/s | Dual Front Airbags | Anti-lock Braking | Automatic Air Con / Climate Control | Apple Car Play | Adaptive Cruise Control with Emergency Stop | Active On-Demand 4x4 System | Automatic Stop/Start | Adjustable Steering Column | Adjustable Steering Wheel | 17 Inch Alloy Wheels | Hard Top Roof/Soft Top Roof | Bluetooth Connectivity | Cargo Tie Down Points | Diff Lock Rear | Daytime Running Lights - LED | Electronic Stability Control | Front Diff Lock | Fog Lights - LED | Floor Mats - All Weather | Hill Start Assist | Leather Steering Wheel |
Leather Upholstery | Multi-function Steering Wheel | Park Assist Front & Rear |
Power Mirrors | Power Windows | Reversing Camera | Rear View Mirror - Auto Dimming | Subwoofer | Traction Control System | Tyre Pressure Monitoring System | 

Trade-Ins are Welcome.
Finance can be arranged with all major banks with a additional administrative fee. Warranty options are available.

Power - 209 kW @ 6350 rpm
Torque - 347 Nm @ 4300 rpm
Economy - 11.4 l/100km
Emissions - 270 g/km
Gears - 6 / ALL
Acceleration - 8.1 seconds
Top Speed - 180km/h
Airbags (total) - 4
Seats - 5
Fuel Tank Capacity - 70 litres
Service Intervals - 20,000 km

The GWM P-Series has arrived to take on the segment's heavyweights. There's nothing small about the new P-Series. It's big, bold, and shiny. The P-Series' interior execution and standard features list are mightily impressive for a bakkie at this price point and sure to make a bold statement in any setting. Ready for action on the site of large construction or fit to transport you on an elegant night out on the town. Nothing in the pick-up truck segment turns heads like the P-Series
